name: Bug City
description:
Your goal is to infest as many data as possible in the city !

In order to do that, you have several cards to help your bugs infest the city !

List of cards :

A random part of the city is infested, data entering it have a 1/3 chance to be infected ( 20 seconds )

When colliding, infected data can transmit it's bug with a 1/10 chance (15 seconds )

Data move two times faster ( 15 seconds )

Every data part has a 1/10 chance to be bugged !
A giant infected data rushes the city and has a 1/2 chance to transmit it's bug ( 15 seconds )
Draw two cards next time you choose !
Healers can't move ( 20 seconds )
Healers are useless ( 15 seconds )
Bugged data is two times faster ( 20 seconds )
5 infected data and 5 clean data spawn at the Spot 0
5 infected data and 5 clean data spawn at the Spot 1
Data passing by the Spot 0 are sent to another city
Data passing by the Spot 1 are sent to another city
